c74object.name: fl.pad~
c74object.digest: Pads an input frame with a fixed value at either the start the end, or both.
c74object.description: The output frame size is at least the same length as the input, plus the number of padding values. Padding amounts may be set in samples, or as a ratio of the input length.

entry.name: 1. /start [double]
entry.description: Sets the amount of padding to apply at the start of the frame.

entry.name: 2. /end [double]
entry.description: Sets the amount of padding to apply at the end of the frame.

entry.name: 3. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets units for padding amounts (samples or ratios [0-1]).
[0] - samples [1] - ratios
